EventCode=4740 | stats dc(user)"},"name":"Locked Out Accounts"},"ds_2BFhRhDn":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`wineventlog-index` EventCode=4740 | stats latest(_time) AS time by user | sort | sort -time"},"name":"Locked Out accounts table"},"ds_Ef6TyDH6":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`wineventlog-index` (EventCode=576 OR EventCode=577 OR EventCode=4672 OR EventCode=578 OR EventCode=4674) | stats count by user, EventCode, signature 
| sort - count"},"name":"Privileges Escalations Table"},"ds_QPWRWJaw_ds_LU8B2pAB":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`wineventlog-index` EventCode=4740 | stats dc(user)"},"name":"Copy of Locked Out Accounts"},"ds_ocKzSXCS":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`wineventlog-index` (EventCode=576 OR EventCode=577 OR EventCode=4672 OR EventCode=578 OR EventCode=4674) | stats count"},"name":"Privileges Escalations"},"ds_E71YdNWc":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication where Authentication.app=win* by Authentication.action"},"name":"Logons Pie"},"ds_3DQenm9a":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication where Authentication.action=failure"},"name":"Failed authenitcations"},"ds_35nAHD9f":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication where Authentication.action=success"},"name":"Successful Authentications"},"ds_NblYEr9v":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats prestats=true summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication where Authentication.app=win* by _time, Authentication.action span=10m 
| timechart minspan=10m useother=true count by Authentication.action"},"name":"Logon Success/Failure"},"ds_s0pex9kU":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats prestats=true summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication where Authentication.app=win* by _time, Authentication.user span=10m 
| timechart minspan=10m useother=true count by Authentication.user limit=15"},"name":"Logon by user"},"ds_CxqpvJ2q":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"`wineventlog-index` source="*WinEventLog:Security" NOT Account_Domain="-"
| stats count by Account_Domain 
| eventstats sum(count) as total
| eval total = round(100 * count / total,3)
| sort count"},"name":"Rare Account Domains in Logs"},"ds_WA83Z0t7":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Change.All_Changes where nodename=All_Changes.Account_Management All_Changes.vendor_product="Microsoft Windows" All_Changes.action=created"},"name":"Create Actions"},"ds_8Oi4i303":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Change.All_Changes where nodename=All_Changes.Account_Management All_Changes.vendor_product="Microsoft Windows" All_Changes.action=deleted"},"name":"Delete Actions"},"ds_AqxgsWwJ":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Change.All_Changes where nodename=All_Changes.Account_Management All_Changes.vendor_product="Microsoft Windows" All_Changes.action=modified"},"name":"Modify Actions"},"ds_ArUrMO6e":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Change.All_Changes where nodename=All_Changes.Account_Management All_Changes.vendor_product="Microsoft Windows" by _time, All_Changes.action span=10m 
| rename "All_Changes.action" as action
| timechart minspan=60m count by action"},"name":"User Account Changes"},"ds_BGUkJI1u_ds_3DQenm9a":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true dc(Authentication.user) from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication"},"name":"DC Users"},"ds_OESyKBS4_ds_BGUkJI1u_ds_3DQenm9a":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true dc(Authentication.user) from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication where earliest=-1d latest=now"},"name":"24 hour users"},"ds_pmGHkL0R_ds_BGUkJI1u_ds_3DQenm9a":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true dc(Authentication.app) from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication where Authentication.app="*""},"name":"DC Apps"},"ds_lhtpUVSK":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication where Authentication.app="*" by Authentication.app 
| rename "Authentication.*" as "*" | sort count"},"name":"Authenitications by app"},"ds_ZBIZC8TY_ds_NblYEr9v":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats prestats=true summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication by _time, Authentication.app span=10m 
| timechart minspan=10m useother=true count by Authentication.app"},"name":"Access over time by apps"},"ds_kRPcIdoG":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication by _time,Authentication.src span=10m 
| rename "Authentication.*" as "*" 
| stats sparkline(sum(count),10m) as sparkline,sum(count) as count by src 
| sort - count"},"name":"Authentications by source"},"ds_0JyXspiQ":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true values(Authentication.user) as user, count from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication by _time,Authentication.src span=10m 
| rename "Authentication.*" as "*" 
| stats sparkline(sum(count),10m) as sparkline, dc(user) as user_count by src 
| sort - user_count"},"name":"Top Authentication Sources by Unique User Count"},"ds_N6NMQqVp_ds_BGUkJI1u_ds_3DQenm9a":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true dc(Authentication.user) from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication"},"name":"Copy of DC
